Canvas Site Template

Simple Canvas site template with Rolllup to allow easy project scaffolding with SCSS and Typescript.

Getting started:

  1. Get this template from Github with degit: npx degit luke-codewalker/templates_canvas-site#main <your-project-name>
  2. Install the dependencies with npm i
  3. Run npm start and got to http://localhost:5000/
  4. Happy hacking ðŸš€ðŸŽ‰!

Background animation

Press + or - to in- or decrease framerate Press space to pause the animation Press c to clear everything and restart the animation
